function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of IEQ monitoring systems in buildings","Impact":"Inaccurate evaluation of indoor environment quality","Mitigation":"Implementation of IEQ monitoring systems and regular maintenance","Technologies":"IEQ monitoring equipment","People":"Building occupants","Owner":"Building management"},{"Description":"Poor air quality measures","Impact":"Increased risk of respiratory diseases and discomfort","Mitigation":"Regular ventilation, air filtration, and air quality monitoring","Technologies":"Air quality sensors, HVAC systems","People":"Building occupants","Owner":"Building management"},{"Description":"Inadequate thermal comfort measures","Impact":"Decreased comfort and productivity, increased risk of health issues","Mitigation":"Optimization of temperature, humidity, and air flow, proper clothing guidelines","Technologies":"Thermostats, humidity sensors, air circulation systems","People":"Building occupants","Owner":"Building management"}]}
